p: A total of 5,222 results were adopted from the WoS on ML in the context of diabetes (2010–2023). There were 4,757 articles, followed by 465 reviews, and 39 proceeding papers. A total of 120 countries participated in writing articles. The retrieved articles had 92,182 citations, and the mean number of citations per item was 17. 65. There were 62,332 citing articles. A total of 27,155 authors contributed to the research. The language distribution was as follows: English (5,177), German (12), Chinese (6), Russian (5), and Korean (3). Figure 1 shows the trend of published articles on ML in the context of diabetes (2010–2023).
